text: Ej axli kitoʙ, pajomʙari Mo (Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam) nazdi sumo omad, to ʙisjore az kitoʙi Allohro, ki az mardumi oddi va ʙesavod pinhon medosted, (sifathoi Pajomʙar sallallohu alajhi va sallam, ojati racm va monandi inro) ʙarojaton ʙajon kunad va az ʙajoni ʙisjor cizhoe, ki hikmate dar on nest, sarfi nazar kunad va darguzarad, hamono az coniʙi Alloh nure (Islom) va kitoʙe sarehu oskor (Qur'on) ʙar sumo nozil sudaast, ki ʙa vositai on torikii ʙesavodi ʙa nuri ilmu donis ravsan mesavad
